original: ‘aho vatāhaṁ kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjeyyan’ti.
analyzed: aho vata aham kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā ākāsa anañca āyatana upagānam devānam sahabyatam upapajjeyyanti

original: So taṁ cittaṁ dahati, taṁ cittaṁ adhiṭṭhāti, taṁ cittaṁ bhāveti.
analyzed: saḥ tam cittam dahati tam cittam adhiṭṭhāti tam cittam bhāveti

original: Tassa te saṅkhārā ca vihārā ca evaṁ bhāvitā evaṁ bahulīkatā tatrupapattiyā saṁvattanti.
analyzed: tassa te saṅkhārā ca vihārā ca evam bhāvitā evam bahulīka tā tatra upapattiyā savattanti

original: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, maggo ayaṁ paṭipadā tatrupapattiyā saṁvattati.
analyzed: bhikkhave maggaḥ ayam paṭipadā tatrupapattiyā savattati

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhāya samannāgato hoti, sīlena …
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu saddhāya samannāgataḥ hoti sīlena
